author: vors
body:
As part of #2058 and #2154 we discovered few places where we have a commented-out code.

I.e. https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/Microsoft.WSMan.Management/CredSSP.cs#L59

We should revisit this code and possible remove.

comments.author: vors
comments.body: Also, https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/7a89b33f8b0de97f592f65354ea435df7f163302/src/Microsoft.PowerShell.PackageManagement/Utility/HostApiExtensions.cs#L85 is not apparently used anywhere, including ISE (which is different codebase, but has internal visibility)

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: More code cleanup not needed for 6.0.0.

comments.author: mi-hol
comments.body: @vpondala did you create a pull request for your changes?

comments.author: vpondala
comments.body:
Hi @mi-hol

Yes, I definitely did. The issue is #7935
<https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/7935>.

Thanks
Vijay

title: Remove unused commented-out code
